name: Flipip
description:
Welcome to Flipip!

Controls:

  • 100% mouse interaction
  • Set the game to fullscreen with the Enter key *RECOMMENDED*
  • Escape at any time with Esc

Flipip is a strategic-grid based card game! You play as a die, and every round you will roll and get that many spaces to move

Every card you move over flips it, and at the end of your movement you choose 1 to fight! 

To fight, your main creature is deployed with a support card from your hand, it sits above your Draw Pile and participates in all fights. If it dies you lose!

 These 2 cards will roll their dice. Each card has 2 abilities, weak, and strong. If the die they roll>than the dice picture on their card, they will use the strong move! The enemy will counter with their own attack.

Defeating cards adds them to your deck!

Keep a loop out for  Boss cards with the purple background, as you will need to beat it to win. It is extremely powerful!

Creatures cards have attack types based on their borders. Grey borders deal flat damage regardless of border types, red cards deal double damage to green, blue to red, and green to blue.

red>green>blue>red

The reverse it true, if you deal damage to the color stronger than yours, it does half.

Flipping cards will reveal cards of a higher level that are stronger, after lvl3 they wont be replaced!

Loss conditions

  • Running out of valid cards to move to
  • You lose all hp

Win Conditions

  • Defeat the boss monster!
